Html:
I'm trying to put an ITypedList to the DataGrid.ItemsSource and all cells are shown empty.

Is there any way to get a DataGridColumn wrapping a System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor instance?
I supposed it is done by the "DataGridColumn.CreateDefaultColumn" but it isn't, since the only PropertyDescriptor members CreateDefaultColumn knows are: Name, PropertyType and IsReadOnly. But I need the full PropertyDescriptor support (first of all the GetValue and the SetValue methods).
